alert.note: Alert for City of Fredericksburg; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 6:06AM EST until December 23 at 8:20PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Rappahannock River at Fredericksburg affecting City of Fredericksburg, Stafford and Spotsylvania independent cities. Goose Creek near Leesburg affecting Loudoun County. For the Rappahannock River...including Remington, Fredericksburg, Fredericksburg...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Goose Creek...including Leesburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rappahannock River at Fredericksburg. * WHEN...From this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water enters a basement at a home near Fredericksburg City Dock. Old Mill Park begins to flood and will be closed. Water enters a guest house off Caroline Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:23 AM EST Friday the stage was 6.9 feet, or 6.1 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && River Name Fld Observed Fri Fri Sat Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1PM 7PM 1AM Stg Time Date Rappahannock River Fredericksburg 13.0 6.9 Fri 4 am 13.2 12.3 10.3 13.2 1pm Fri &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 315 PM EST.
